title: J Is For Judgment
description: Wendell Jaffe looks great for a dead man! Heâ s been six feet under for five years agoâ until his former insurance agent spots him at a dusty resort bar in Mexico. Now California Fidelity wants its insurance money back. Can P.I. Kinsey Millhone get on the case?Just two months earlier, Jaffeâ s widow pocketed $500,000 in insurance benefits after Jaffe went overboard. Was his â pseudocideâ a last-ditch effort to do right by his beloved wife? Perhaps. But how would that explain the new woman in Jaffeâ s second life?Kinsey is in for the long haul as she delves deeper into the mystery surrounding Jaffeâ s life and deathâ ¦and discovers that, in family matters as in crime, sometimes it's better to reserve judgmentâ ¦
author: Sue Grafton
